H0.text: In one of Walter Scott's Waverley' novels what was The Heart of Midlothian. Edinburgh Castle

H1.text: In one of Walter Scott's Waverley' novels what was The Heart of Midlothian. The Royal Mile

H2.text: In one of Walter Scott's Waverley' novels what was The Heart of Midlothian. The Scottish Crown Jewels

H3.text: In one of Walter Scott's Waverley' novels what was The Heart of Midlothian. Gaol

A4.text: The prison was described by Sir Walter Scott as the 'Heart of Midlothian', and soon after demolition the city fathers marked the site with a heart mosaic.
